dataQuery.sqlStatement: set dateformat dmy go select dateadd(minute, datepart(TZoffset, sysdatetimeoffset()), DTEvent) as DTEvent, CaptEvent, ValEvent from fGetLogEvent( (select top 1 idObject1 from LinkAccount where idAccount = :p_idAccount order by priority), (select top 1 idObject2 from LinkAccount where idAccount = :p_idAccount order by priority), :p_typeEvent, :p_dtBeg, :p_dtEnd)
